languages.text: {n}Паскаль прерывает вас бесконечно властным жестом мехадендрита.{/n} "Не стоит. Это лишь наш спор. Наша дилемма".
{n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль прерывает вас бесконечно властным жестом мехадендрита.{/n} "Не стоит. Это лишь наш спор. Наша дилемма".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは明確に命令するしぐさを機械触手で示してあなたを静止させる。{/n}「その必要はありません。この論争は、このジレンマは、自分たちだけのものです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは明確に命令するしぐさを機械触手で示してあなたを静止させる。{/n}「その必要はありません。この論争は、このジレンマは、自分たちだけのものです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须做了个充满威严的手势，打断了你的话。{/n}“没有必要。这场争论，这场困境，都是我们自己的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须做了个充满威严的手势，打断了你的话。{/n}“没有必要。这场争论，这场困境，都是我们自己的事情。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal vous interrompt d'un geste impérieux de sa mécadendrite.{/n} « C'est inutile. Ce débat, ce dilemme ne concerne personne d'autre que nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vous interrompt d'un geste impérieux de sa mécadendrite.{/n} « C'est inutile. Ce débat, ce dilemme ne concerne personne d'autre que nous. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te interrumpe con un gesto exageradamente autoritario con su mecadendrita.{/n} «No es necesario. Este debate, o dilema, es asunto nuestro».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te interrumpe con un gesto exageradamente autoritario con su mecadendrita.{/n} «No es necesario. Este debate, o dilema, es asunto nuestro».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal unterbricht dich mit einer extrem gebieterischen Geste seines Mechadendriten.{/n} "Das ist nicht nötig. Diese Debatte, dieses Dilemma sind allein unser."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal unterbricht dich mit einer extrem gebieterischen Geste seines Mechadendriten.{/n} "Das ist nicht nötig. Diese Debatte, dieses Dilemma sind allein unser."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, son derece buyurgan bir mekadentrit hareketiyle sözünü kesiyor.{/n} "Buna gerek yok. Bu münakaşa, bu ikilem... İkimiz aramızda."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal interrupts you with an extremely commanding gesture of his mechadendrite.{/n} "There is no need for that. This debate, this dilemma, is ours alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, mekadentritinin son derece buyurgan bir hareketiyle sözünü bölüyor.{/n} "Buna gerek yok. Bu münakaşa, bu ikilem, yalnızca bize ait."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
